list_translation_mean.translate_mean: để vật gì trên lưng ngựa

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a seat fastened on the back of a horse or other animal for riding, typically made of leather and raised at the front and rear.
a low part of a ridge between two higher points or peaks.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: follow the road which goes across the saddle between two tors
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: đi theo con đường đi qua yên giữa hai tors

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a shaped support on which a cable, wire, or pipe rests.
the lower part of the back in a mammal or fowl, especially when distinct in shape or marking.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: feathers at the rear of a rooster's saddle
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: lông ở phía sau yên xe của một con gà trống

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he was in the stable saddling up his horse
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh ta đang ở trong chuồng ngựa của mình
